cgcloud__BO_API_Step_Input_Structure__c.name: cgcloud__BO_API_Step_Input_Structure__c
cgcloud__BO_API_Step_Input_Structure__c.description: This table stores the input structure configuration that the business object API workflow step expects.

RecordTypeId.description: RecordType of the Business Object API Step Input Structure.

cgcloud__BO_API_Workflow_Step__c.description: Reference to the business object API workflow step.

cgcloud__Description__c.description: Stores the purpose of the mapped data.

cgcloud__Maps_To__c.description: Used for the mapValues rule. Defines the field in the output in which the value is to be mapped. You can specify a list of fields by separating them with commas. Use the <<NS>> token to replace it with the required namespace.

cgcloud__Maximum_Items__c.description: Defines the maximum number of items. Shown for RecordType Array.

cgcloud__Maximum_Length__c.description: Defines the maximum length of the String. Shown for RecordType String.

cgcloud__Maximum__c.description: Defines the maximum value of the Number. Shown for RecordType Number.

cgcloud__Minimum_Items__c.description: Defines the minimum number of items. Shown for RecordType Array.

cgcloud__Minimum_Length__c.description: Defines the minimum length of the String. Shown for RecordType String.

cgcloud__Minimum__c.description: Defines the minimum value of the Number. Shown for RecordType Number.

cgcloud__Path__c.description: Defines the path of the Input .json file in which the attribute is available.

cgcloud__Pattern__c.description: Defines the pattern that the String must match. The input must compile to a APEX RegExp. APEX uses the Java RegExp engine. Shown for RecordType String.

cgcloud__Required__c.description: Determines whether the property is required.
